input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "JAXXON"
Reference Product Name: "14k Silver Cuban Link Chain - 8mm"
Reference Product Description:
Introducing our silver 8mm stainless steel Cuban Link Chain â€“ a statement of timeless elegance and enduring strength. Crafted with precision and exceptional resiliency, this chain is designed to withstand tarnishing, corrosion, and daily wear. Elevate your style with its bold 8mm gauge and classic Cuban link design, making it the perfect choice for any occasions.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='CRAFTD Cuban Link Silver Chain, 23.5"'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Cuban Silver Set'
  - Name='Tennis Chain'
  - Name='CRAFTD London Snake Chain 2mm'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Gold Cuban Link Bracelet'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Cuban Black Set'
  - Name='CRAFTD London Tennis Chain Necklace'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Link Gold Chain'
  - Name='CRAFTD London Gold Snake Chain Necklace'
  - Name='CRAFTD 5MM Silver Wheat Chain Necklace'
  - Name='JAXXON 3mm Cuban Silver Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON Iced Out Capitol Silver Pendant Chain'
  - Name='CRAFTD London 2mm Rope'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Link Silver Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Cuban Gold Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Cuban Link Gold Chain, 20"'
  - Name='JAXXON 3mm Cuban Link'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm JX1 Automatic Watch + Cuban Link'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Link Silver Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Link Silver Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Cuban Silver Chain Set'
  - Name='Men's CRAFTD London Round Box Chain'
  - Name='CRAFTD London Silver Toggle Chain Necklace'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='CRAFTD London Connell Chain'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Silver Cuban Link Chain similar in style and material, likely similar construction but different size.
Same brand, same gauge (8mm), same Cuban silver style, very close match.
Different chain style (Tennis) and design, only somewhat related as a chain.
Different chain style (Snake), much thinner (2mm), less relevant.
Same Cuban Link construction but a bracelet, gold instead of silver, and thicker (10mm).
Same gauge and Cuban Link style, black color likely coating but highly relevant.
Different chain style (Tennis), chains but less similarity.
Same chain style but thinner (5mm), gold instead of silver, relevant but not very close.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CRAFTD London Gold Snake Chain Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Snake chain style different from Cuban link, also gold and likely thinner.
Different chain style (Wheat) and thinner (5mm), not similar construction.
Same style and material but much thinner (3mm) so some relevance but less similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON Iced Out Capitol Silver Pendant Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Silver chain from same brand with pendant, style may differ, moderately relevant.
Rope chain style very different from Cuban Link and much thinner.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Link Silver Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same style and material, thinner (5mm) but iced out detail may differ.
Same style and gauge but gold instead of silver; construction and size very close.
Same gauge and Cuban linkage, gold color but similar product type.
Same chain style but thinner (3mm), same brand, lower relevance due to size difference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 8mm JX1 Automatic Watch + Cuban Link
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Includes a Cuban Link chain but bundled with a watch; chain likely similar but bundled product.
Same material and style but thinner (5mm) so moderately close.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Link Silver Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same material and style but thicker (10mm) with iced out detail; somewhat close.
Same style and material but thicker gauge (10mm), relevant but less so than 8mm.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's CRAFTD London Round Box Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different chain style (Round Box), no similarity to Cuban Link style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CRAFTD London Silver Toggle Chain Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Toggle chain style differs from Cuban Link, silver material but different construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Link Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same style and material but thicker (10mm) and iced out; relevant but not exact match.
Connell chain style is distinct and unrelated to Cuban Link shape and construction.
